about_the_game:
A Demon of the NetherRealm, Quan Chi has mastered black magic to harness the power of the dead. Now a master of the Netherrealm's most vile sorcery, Quan Chi plots with Shang Tsung to conquer the realms. He will not be denied.

This pack includes playable character Quan Chi including all new move-sets.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
A Demon of the NetherRealm, Quan Chi has mastered black magic to harness the power of the dead. Now a master of the Netherrealm's most vile sorcery, Quan Chi plots with Shang Tsung to conquer the realms. He will not be denied.

This pack includes playable character Quan Chi including all new move-sets.
